EmailTemplate.description: Progression Management - Managing Students to Submission
EmailTemplate.name: Progression Management - Managing Students to Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: Progression Management - Managing Students to Submission - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email regarding the milestone.
I would strongly recommend that you contact your Supervisor, Graduate Co-ordinator and/or research administrator in your Academic Unit/Faculty, to discuss the matters outlined in your email. The research administrator will be able to assist you with your concerns.
Should you have any concerns or require further assistance, you are welcome to contact me.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
